name: Julien Look
role: Software Engineer, Data Scientist, Fullstack Engineer

projects.title: Pipeline for Industrial SaaS Platform
projects.description: Built and scaled a GCP backbone for an industrial SaaS platform, introduced a data-driven DevOps pipeline for predictable releases, and teamed up with Data Science to automate model retraining—cutting deployment times and keeping ML outputs continuously up-to-date.

projects.title: AI Voice Agent
projects.description: Rolled out a voice-controlled AI concierge on the company’s website that recommends services, answers customer questions via RAG, and books appointments autonomously—boosting conversions while offloading routine support.

projects.title: AI Application Agent
projects.description: Created an AI assistant that matches candidates to suitable roles and auto-drafts personalized cover letters, slashing application time and boosting the number of high-quality submissions per day.

projects.title: Adjunct Lecturer in MLOps
projects.description: Designed and taught a hands-on MLOps seminar covering automated data wrangling, ML lifecycle management, monitoring, and orchestration. Provided real-world case studies and interactive labs.

projects.title: R-Cycle Customer Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a dashboard to track plastic production cycles for manufacturers to comply with recycling regulations. Led architectural improvements, code refactoring, and UI optimizations. Created reusable UI components using React, SASS, and CoreUI. Integrated Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for file management and data analysis.

projects.title: Remote Robot Operation App
projects.description: Developed a remote robot control platform using Python FastAPI. Implemented a navigation tracking system using OpenCV for precise robot movement. Created a performance tracking system with MLflow and Scikit-Learn. Developed a Selenium Grid testing suite with Allure report analysis.

projects.title: Adjunct Lecturer in Data Analytics
projects.description: Taught Data Analytics, Machine Learning, Web Scraping, and API development to groups of ~15 students. Designed study materials and final projects.

projects.title: AI Parent Advisor
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered chatbot for parenting advice using OpenAI GPT models and WhatsApp API. Scaled the application with Microservices Architecture and NX Monorepo. Built an analytics dashboard with React.js to track user behavior and enable data-driven optimizations. Managed AWS infrastructure with Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, Cognito, and EC2.

projects.title: Shopify Storefront
projects.description: Developed a custom Shopify storefront using Remix.js (Hydrogen) and Shopify GraphQL APIs. Led a team of four developers for technical execution.

projects.title: Microsoft Teams Extension
projects.description: Developed a Microsoft Teams Message Extension to enhance enterprise communication. Architected Microsoft Azure infrastructure and implemented CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment.

projects.title: Listify
projects.description: Developed a platform to automate Spotify playlist conversion into DJ setlists using web scraping techniques.

projects.title: AI-Powered Tax Assistant
projects.description: Led AI-driven automation of financial data processing. Optimized ETL pipelines, reducing cloud costs by 90%. Developed an AI-powered chatbot for customer support.

projects.title: ML Research in Quality Science
projects.description: Conducted Machine Learning research in Quality Science. Developed ML models for anomaly detection and predictive analytics.

projects.title: ML Music Classification
projects.description: Developed a CNN-based music classification model to identify music eras. Implemented Recurrent CNNs for time series analysis.

projects.title: Bosch Linux Distribution
projects.description: Developed Debian-based Linux OS components for industrial automation systems. Implemented a security verification system for untrusted software installations.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science - Computational Engineering Science
